  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnalitApplication
    Receives data from MS Core Service via Kafka, and stores it in the MySQL database.
    CartApplication
    Implements the functionality of the user's shopping cart, receives and stores a list of products in the object recycle bin, then saves it to the Redis database.
    CoreServiceApplication
    Works with products and their categories, user orders and interactions with the PayPal payment system.
    FrontApplication
    Works with the front of all sections of the store, routes movement the user by its sections (implementation in JS).
    GatewayApp
    GateWay Service (BackEnd routing between the store's MS) Configured routing by the store's MS with access validation.
    JwtAuthFilter
    It passes incoming requests through itself, checks the user for his status - authorized or not.
    JwtAuthFilter.Config
     
    JwtUtil
    Utilities parse the token into components and give an answer to 2 questions, whether the temporary buffer of the token has expired and whether the token is valid at the moment.
    WebAuthServiceApplication
    Contains a security module that issues tokens to users who have passed authorization.
